languages.text: "Она поведала мне о том, что увидела в твоих покоях... кусок ее собственного дома — разрушенного, искаженного до неузнаваемости, низведенного до трофея на стене! О да, это стало переломным моментом. Последней каплей, переполнившей чашу ее наивного доверия к мон-кай... и она пришла искать ответы к собрату".

traits.locale_text: "Она поведала мне о том, что увидела в твоих покоях... кусок ее собственного дома — разрушенного, пораженного неизвестной болезнью, низведенного до статуса трофея на стене! О да, это стало переломным моментом. Последней каплей, переполнившей чашу ее наивного доверия к мон-кай... и она пришла искать ответы к собрату".
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "She told me what she had seen in your chambers... a piece of her home, destroyed, twisted beyond recognition, reduced to a trophy on a wall! Yes, that was the breaking point for her. The final drop in a deep well of doubt, dispelling her naive trust of mon-keigh once and for all... And then she came seeking answers from her dark cousin."
languages.original_text: "Она поведала мне о том, что увидела в твоих покоях... кусок ее собственного дома — разрушенного, искаженного до неузнаваемости, низведенного до трофея на стене! О да, это стало переломным моментом. Последней каплей, переполнившей чашу ее наивного доверия к мон-кай... и она пришла искать ответы к собрату".

traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «Me dijo lo que había visto en tus aposentos... ¡Un trozo de su mundo, destruido, retorcido hasta ser prácticamente irreconocible y convertido en trofeo en una pared! Eso fue lo último. La gota que colmó un gran vaso de dudas, disipando su ingenua fe en los mon-keigh de una vez por todas... y entonces vino a su primo oscuro pidiendo respuestas».
languages.original_text: "She told me what she had seen in your chambers... a piece of her home, destroyed, twisted beyond recognition, reduced to a trophy on a wall! Yes, that was the breaking point for her. The final drop in a deep well of doubt, dispelling her naive trust of mon-keigh once and for all... And then she came seeking answers from her dark cousin."

traits.locale_text: «Me dijo lo que había visto en tus aposentos... ¡Un trozo de su mundo, destruido, retorcido hasta ser prácticamente irreconocible y convertido en trofeo en una pared! Eso fue lo último. La gota que colmó un gran vaso de dudas, disipando su ingenua fe en los mon-keigh de una vez por todas... y entonces vino a su primo oscuro pidiendo respuestas».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “她告诉我，说她在你的房间里看到了什么……她看到了她家园的一部分，被扭曲得面目全非，被挂在墙上，变成了战利品！是啊，她就是那个时候崩溃的。她打消了最后一丝疑虑，彻底放下了对猴子天真的信任……随后，她便向她的黑暗灵族表哥寻求答案。”
languages.original_text: "She told me what she had seen in your chambers... a piece of her home, destroyed, twisted beyond recognition, reduced to a trophy on a wall! Yes, that was the breaking point for her. The final drop in a deep well of doubt, dispelling her naive trust of mon-keigh once and for all... And then she came seeking answers from her dark cousin."

traits.locale_text: “她告诉我，说她在你的房间里看到了什么……她看到了她家园的一部分，被扭曲得面目全非，被挂在墙上，变成了战利品！是啊，她就是那个时候崩溃的。她打消了最后一丝疑虑，彻底放下了对猴子天真的信任……随后，她便向她的黑暗灵族表哥寻求答案。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「あいつはお前の部屋で見たものについて話してくれたよ…自分の故郷の一部が、破壊され、認識できぬほどゆがめられ、壁に飾られた戦利品へと化していたってな！そう、あれでついにあいつの疑惑の水がこぼれたのさ。疑念の深い井戸の最後の一滴が落ち、モン＝ケイに対する素朴な信頼が消えた…そして闇のいとこに答えを求めてやってきたのさ」
languages.original_text: "She told me what she had seen in your chambers... a piece of her home, destroyed, twisted beyond recognition, reduced to a trophy on a wall! Yes, that was the breaking point for her. The final drop in a deep well of doubt, dispelling her naive trust of mon-keigh once and for all... And then she came seeking answers from her dark cousin."

traits.locale_text: 「あいつはお前の部屋で見たものについて話してくれたよ…自分の故郷の一部が、破壊され、認識できぬほどゆがめられ、壁に飾られた戦利品へと化していたってな！そう、あれでついにあいつの疑惑の水がこぼれたのさ。疑念の深い井戸の最後の一滴が落ち、モン＝ケイに対する素朴な信頼が消えた…そして闇のいとこに答えを求めてやってきたのさ」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Elle m'a dit ce qu'elle avait vu dans vos quartiers... un fragment de son ancien foyer, détruit et altéré au point d'en être méconnaissable, réduit à l'état de trophée accroché sur un mur ! Ce fut pour elle le point de non-retour. La goutte d'eau qui a fait déborder le puits insondable de ses doutes, dissipant une fois pour toutes sa crédulité envers les mon-keigh... Et c'est alors qu'elle est venue chercher des réponses auprès de son sombre cousin. »
languages.original_text: "She told me what she had seen in your chambers... a piece of her home, destroyed, twisted beyond recognition, reduced to a trophy on a wall! Yes, that was the breaking point for her. The final drop in a deep well of doubt, dispelling her naive trust of mon-keigh once and for all... And then she came seeking answers from her dark cousin."

traits.locale_text: « Elle m'a dit ce qu'elle avait vu dans vos quartiers... un fragment de son ancien foyer, détruit et altéré au point d'en être méconnaissable, réduit à l'état de trophée accroché sur un mur ! Ce fut pour elle le point de non-retour. La goutte d'eau qui a fait déborder le puits insondable de ses doutes, dissipant une fois pour toutes sa crédulité envers les mon-keigh... Et c'est alors qu'elle est venue chercher des réponses auprès de son sombre cousin. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Sie hat mir gesagt, was sie in Euren Gemächern gesehen hat ... einen Teil Ihrer Heimat, zerstört, bis zur Unkenntlichkeit entstellt, zu einer Trophäe an einer Wand reduziert! Ja, das war für sie der letzte Tropfen. Der letzte Tropfen in einem tiefen Krug des Zweifels, der letzte Tropfen, der ihr naives Vertrauen in die Chem-Pan-Sey ein für alle Mal zerstörte ... Und dann erbat sie Antworten von ihrem dunklen Vetter."
languages.original_text: "She told me what she had seen in your chambers... a piece of her home, destroyed, twisted beyond recognition, reduced to a trophy on a wall! Yes, that was the breaking point for her. The final drop in a deep well of doubt, dispelling her naive trust of mon-keigh once and for all... And then she came seeking answers from her dark cousin."

traits.locale_text: "Sie hat mir gesagt, was sie in Euren Gemächern gesehen hat ... einen Teil Ihrer Heimat, zerstört, bis zur Unkenntlichkeit entstellt, zu einer Trophäe an einer Wand reduziert! Ja, das war für sie der letzte Tropfen. Der letzte Tropfen in einem tiefen Krug des Zweifels, der letzte Tropfen, der ihr naives Vertrauen in die Chem-Pan-Sey ein für alle Mal zerstörte ... Und dann erbat sie Antworten von ihrem dunklen Vetter."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.original_text: "She told me what she had seen in your chambers... a piece of her home, destroyed, twisted beyond recognition, reduced to a trophy on a wall! Yes, that was the breaking point for her. The final drop in a deep well of doubt, dispelling her naive trust of mon-keigh once and for all... And then she came seeking answers from her dark cousin."

languages.text: "Odanda neler gördüğünü anlattı... Yurdundan bir parça görmüş. Yok edilmiş, tanınmaz hâlde gelmiş, duvara asılan bir süse indirgenmiş! İşte o an, kırılma noktasıydı. Şüphe kuyularını taşıran son damla. Mon-keigh'e olan güveni temelli sarsıldı... Cevaplarını da bu karanlık soydaşında aradı."
languages.original_text: "She told me what she had seen in your chambers... a piece of her home, destroyed, twisted beyond recognition, reduced to a trophy on a wall! Yes, that was the breaking point for her. The final drop in a deep well of doubt, dispelling her naive trust of mon-keigh once and for all... And then she came seeking answers from her dark cousin."

traits.locale_text: "Odanda neler gördüğünü anlattı... Yurdundan bir parça. Yok edilmiş, tanınmaz hâlde gelmiş, duvara asılan bir süse indirgenmiş! İşte o an, kırılma noktasıydı. Şüphe kuyularını taşıran son damlaydı. Mon-keigh'e olan güveni temelli sarsıldı... Cevaplarını da bu karanlık soydaşında aradı."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
